messages.content: Hi! I'd like to use this chat to share some standard English texts with you, one at a time. Can you correct any grammar or spelling errors and make sure the corrected versions sound both casual and professional? In addition to the text correction assistance, can you also analyse the sentiment of the text and provide an alternative version with no negative sentiments? Thanks a lot!

Of course, I'd be happy to help you with that. Please go ahead and send in your text, and I will review it for you and provide any necessary corrections. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to ask.

"Hi, as promised, here is our proposal for the new team configuration once it has been approved. I will be primarily involved in the new project, but I will allocate at least 25% of my time to support the current team. We will be joining the current team and joining Pepe, who will assume leadership roles."

"Hi! I hope this message finds you well. I am excited to bring our proposal to the team for review. After careful review and consideration, I have made the necessary adjustments to ensure a successful collaboration. I will be primarily involved in the new project, but I will also continue to support the current team and join Pepe, who will assume leadership roles. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need additional support. Thank you for considering my proposal."
